waitingRoom.title: Please wait
waitingRoom.redirection: You will be automatically redirected to the video consultation as soon as they connect.
waitingRoom.pleaseWait: Please stay connected and keep this window open.
waitingRoom.disclaimer: If after 30 minutes the connection has still not been established, please do not hesitate to contact their office.
waitingRoom.doctorDelayed.title: Appointment delayed
waitingRoom.doctorDelayed.message: Your doctor informs you that the appointment is delayed by {{doctorDelayInMinute}} min (estimated time: {{startTime}})
